# 95. Remove DefaultChangeFeedPillow From CommCareHQ

**Date:** 2026-01-13

**Optional per env:** _required on all environments_


## CommCare Version Dependency
This change is not known to be dependent on any particular version of CommCare.


## Change Context
Remove the DefaultChangeFeedPillow from CommCareHQ.

## Details
The DefaultChangeFeedPillow is no longer used in CommCareHQ.
It should be removed from all environments.

## Steps to update
To remove the DefaultChangeFeedPillow from all environments, run the following commands:

Pull the latest version of commcare-cloud
```bash
git pull origin master
```

Then run the update-supervisor-confs command:
```bash
cchq <env> update-supervisor-confs --limit=pillowtop
```
